segments.text: I would like to order a suit made to my own measure .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I share the same opinion . You are over-weight so it's hard for you to buy clothes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe I should try to lose weight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here is one tailor's shop . Why not order one here ?
segments.speaker: S2
